Serverinformation: Set the main communication settings to your server
ipUrl: url or ip of the server
ipUrlTooltip: input the ip-address, or the url you want to connect to
portTooltip: input the port for the connection
sslTooltip: if your connection uses ssl, please enable this checkbox (hppts instead http is used)
AuthenticationInformation: Set the authentication for your server (if needed)
OriginInformation: Set the origin of the expected data
originTooltip: select the origin of your data
name: name
nameTooltip: insert the name of the state, for this dowlink
portDownlinkTooltip: input the port you want to send in the downlink
priorityTooltip: input the priority you want to send in the downlink
typeTooltip: select the type of input you like to chose
confirmedTooltip: if you like to send the download with confirmed message enable this option
frontTooltip: insert the front-value, wich will be set to the downlink (value must be in hex - exept type string)
endTooltip: insert the end-value, wich will be set to the downlink (value must be in hex - exept type string)
lengthInByteTooltip: insert the length of the state in bytes
onTooltip: insert the value you want to send if you set the state to true
offTooltip: insert the value you want to send if you set the state to false
onClickTooltip: insert the value you want to send if you set the state to true (button click)
multiplyfaktorTooltip: insert the faktor you want to multiply your data (eg. 60 for input 1(min) => 60s)
unitTooltip: insert the unit for your value
deviceTypeTooltip: insert the name of the device type, this config is valid. (eg. Dragino XY also matches Dragino)
sendWithUplinkTooltip: choose your send mode for configs with the desired devicetype
decimalPlacesTooltip: select the desired numberof decimal places
swapTooltip: swap the byteoder of the input
crcTooltip: append the crc16 to your data
limitMinTooltip: limits the possibility of inputs in negative direction
limitMinValueTooltip: input the limit in negative direction
limitMaxTooltip: limits the possibility of inputs in positive direction
limitMaxValueTooltip: input the limit in positive direction
keepaliveTooltip: input the time in seconds for keepalive function
customConfigHeader: Add a specific custom Object to each decoded state
customJsonTooltip: Fügen Sie ein Objekt hinzu, welches in common.custom geschrieben wird.
customJsonInformation: With this function it is possible to add your own custom entries to the decoded states. Just input the desired json content in active function.
customJsonActiveTooltip: With this function it is possible to add your own custom entries to the decoded states
